meanings.definition: Able to be changed or modified
meanings.sent1: The document was editable, so I could easily make corrections.
meanings.sent2: She preferred using an editable format for her work to allow for updates.
meanings.sent3: The editable recipe made it simple to adjust the ingredients to my taste.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an editable canvas, ready to be transformed with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The editable software interface was so user-friendly that even beginners could customize it.

meanings.sent1: The editable text allowed me to make changes without any hassle.
meanings.sent2: The website had an editable section where users could update their profiles.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his life story was like an editable document, always open to revisions.
meanings.sent4: The editable video footage was like a blank canvas waiting for creative edits.
meanings.sent5: The editable settings made it easy to personalize the experience to my liking.
